{{Actor| | type = SFX | name = Blood drip | class = CorpseBloodDrip | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: {{Class}} → <u>CorpseBloodDrip</u>
A blood droplet from a {{Class|ZCorpseLynchedNoHeart|hanging corpse}}. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>CorpseBloodDrip</u> { {{Property|Radius}} 1 {{Property|Height}} 4 {{Property|Gravity}} 0.125 +{{Flag|MISSILE}} +{{Flag|NOICEDEATH}} {{Property|DeathSound}} "Drip" States { Spawn: BDRP A -1 Stop Death: BDSH AB 3 BDSH CD 2 Stop } }
